text: Niger at the Olympics is a history which began in 1964. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for the Niger was NGR. "Official abbreviations" at The Games of the XVIII Olympiad, Tokyo, 1964, [p. 9 of 409 PDF]; retrieved 2012-10-12. It is now NIG."Abbreviations, National Olympic Committees," 2009 Annual Report, p. 91 [PDF p. 92 of 94]; retrieved 2012-10-12. ==History== Teams from Niger have been to all Summer Olympic Games held since 1964 except for 1976 and 1980. No athletes from Niger have been in any Winter Olympic Games. == Medalists == Medal Name Games Sport Event 1972 Munich Boxing Men's light welterweight 2016 Rio de Janeiro Taekwondo Men's +80kg ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * Niger at Olympic.org Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of Niger
